jot.physics

Class Kinematics

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.physics.Kinematics

  • public class Kinematics
extends Object
    Class that implements the movement Kinematics.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

        Parameters:
        pastPosition - of an mutable object.
        presentPosition - of an mutable object.
        velocity - of an mutable object.
        gravity - the value of the gravity attraction.
        dt - time passed since projectile started moving.
        Returns:
        the updated position in Cartesian coordinates.
